00001 /* prefetch-IP.cpp: IP-based (PC) prefetcher [http://download.intel.com/technology/architecture/sma.pdf] */
00002 /*
00003  * __COPYRIGHT__ GT
00004  */
00005 #define COMPONENT_NAME "IP"
00006 
00007 
00008 #ifdef PREFETCH_PARSE_ARGS
00009 if(!strcasecmp(COMPONENT_NAME,type))
00010 {
00011   int num_entries;
00012   int last_addr_bits;
00013   int last_stride_bits;
00014   int last_prefetch_bits;
00015   if(sscanf(opt_string,"%*[^:]:%d:%d:%d:%d",&num_entries,&last_addr_bits,&last_stride_bits,&last_prefetch_bits) != 4)
00016     fatal("bad %s prefetcher options string %s (should be \"IP:num_entries:addr-bits:stride-bits:last-PF-bits\")",cp->name,opt_string);
00017   return new prefetch_IP_t(cp,num_entries,last_addr_bits,last_stride_bits,last_prefetch_bits);
00018 }
00019 #else
00020 
00021 class prefetch_IP_t:public prefetch_t
00022 {
00023   protected:
00024   int num_entries;
00025   int mask;
00026 
00027   int last_addr_bits;
00028   int last_stride_bits;
00029   int last_prefetch_bits;
00030 
00031   int last_addr_mask;
00032   int last_stride_mask;
00033   int last_prefetch_mask;
00034 
00035   struct prefetch_IP_table_t {
00036     md_paddr_t last_paddr;
00037     int last_stride;
00038     my2bc_t conf;
00039     md_paddr_t last_prefetch;
00040   } * table;
00041 
00042   public:
00043   /* CREATE */
00044   prefetch_IP_t(struct cache_t * arg_cp,
00045                 int arg_num_entries,
00046                 int arg_last_addr_bits,
00047                 int arg_last_stride_bits,
00048                 int arg_last_prefetch_bits)
00049   {
00050     init();
00051 
00052     char name[256]; /* just used for error checking macros */
00053 
00054     type = strdup("IP");
00055     if(!type)
00056       fatal("couldn't calloc IP-prefetch type (strdup)");
00057 
00058     cp = arg_cp;
00059     sprintf(name,"%s.%s",cp->name,type);
00060 
00061     CHECK_PPOW2(arg_num_entries);
00062     num_entries = arg_num_entries;
00063     mask = num_entries - 1;
00064 
00065     last_addr_bits = arg_last_addr_bits;
00066     last_stride_bits = arg_last_stride_bits;
00067     last_prefetch_bits = arg_last_prefetch_bits;
00068 
00069     last_addr_mask = (1<<last_addr_bits)-1;
00070     last_stride_mask = (1<<last_stride_bits)-1;
00071     last_prefetch_mask = (1<<last_prefetch_bits)-1;
00072 
00073     table = (struct prefetch_IP_t::prefetch_IP_table_t*) calloc(num_entries,sizeof(*table));
00074     if(!table)
00075       fatal("couldn't calloc IP-prefetch table");
00076 
00077     bits = num_entries * (last_addr_bits + last_stride_bits + last_prefetch_bits + 2);
00078     assert(arg_cp);
00079   }
00080 
00081   /* DESTROY */
00082   ~prefetch_IP_t()
00083   {
00084     free(table);
00085     table = NULL;
00086   }
00087 
00088   /* LOOKUP */
00089   PREFETCH_LOOKUP_HEADER
00090   {
00091     lookups++;
00092 
00093     int index = PC & mask;
00094     md_paddr_t pf_paddr = 0;
00095 
00096     /* train entry first */
00097     md_paddr_t last_paddr = (paddr&~last_addr_mask) | table[index].last_paddr;
00098     int this_stride = (paddr - last_paddr) & last_stride_mask;
00099 
00100     if(this_stride == table[index].last_stride)
00101       MY2BC_UPDATE(table[index].conf,true);
00102     else
00103       table[index].conf = MY2BC_STRONG_NT;
00104 
00105     table[index].last_paddr = paddr&last_addr_mask;
00106     table[index].last_stride = this_stride;
00107 
00108     /* only make a prefetch if confident */
00109     if(table[index].conf == MY2BC_STRONG_TAKEN)
00110     {
00111       pf_paddr = paddr + this_stride;
00112       if((pf_paddr & last_prefetch_mask) == table[index].last_prefetch)
00113         pf_paddr = 0; /* don't keep prefetching the same thing */
00114       table[index].last_prefetch = pf_paddr & last_prefetch_mask;
00115     }
00116 
00117     return pf_paddr;
00118   }
00119 };
00120 
00121 
00122 #endif /* PREFETCH_PARSE_ARGS */
00123 #undef COMPONENT_NAME
